item.title: NEM
item.description: score:62 Chances: Newmont Corporation is well positioned to benefit from the recent jump in gold prices, with the precious metal on track for its best annual performance since 2020. Risks: The company’s performance may be affected by fluctuations in gold prices and currency exchange rates.
